text: Antigua and Barbuda does not have any permanent rivers. Following is a list of streams in Antigua. Barbuda does not have any streams. ==Antigua== *Ayers Creek *Cooks Creek *Fitches Creek ==References== *Water Resources Assessment of Dominica, Antigua, Barbuda, St. Kitts and Nevis Antigua and Barbuda Rivers of Antigua and Barbuda Antigua Category:Antigua and Barbuda geography-related lists
title: List of streams of Antigua and Barbuda
